product_name: Rossignol X5 Cross-Country Ski Boots - Men's
long_description: The Rossignol X5 cross-country ski boots combine comfort and support to keep recreational skiers and active enthusiasts cruising along the groomed trails. Inner boots mold to match the contours of your feet as you ski for maximum comfort and control. Free-hinge cuffs with rip-and-stick power straps increase stability, power and control. Speed-lock lace system is simple to use and gives good support for feet. Rossignol X5 cross-country ski boots have zippered outer boots that keep laces free of snow and ice. High cuffs help keep cold air and snow out.
short_description: The Rossignol X5 cross-country ski boots combine comfort and support to keep recreational skiers and active enthusiasts cruising along the groomed trails.
